content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 4:10am this morning and went to bathroom.  when i went back to bedroom, i noticed a red pulsating ball in the sky the size of a basketball.  it was flashing it's lights. i thought it was a star maybe mars, but no i went out to livingroom and went out on patio.  it descended to the ground and within minutes it changed direction and went up on a 45* angle heading to the north side of the city.  there was no clouds in the sky.  i have seen similar things in the sky over a period of a year.
content.summary: Red pulsating star like ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I have had several encounters with what i believe to be beings that are not human. although there have been many encounters i have clears memories of only parts of three of the encounters. the following is a description of what i do remember of those three encounters.
number one: (1970) i was 10 years old
i was living in geata, italy. my father was career navy. we lived there for five years.
one night i woke up to find several strange creatures standing around my bed and doing i do not know what to me. the beings themselves did not really scare me, i was not being harmed. what did scare me was that when they communicated the words were not heard by my ears but would just be understood as sound in my head. i was told that they were preparing me for future visits. i got up from the bed left the room and went across the hall to the door of my parent���s room. i told them what was going on. they told me i was having a bad dream and to go back to bed. i went back to my room. after a few more minutes i was ���told��� by the beings that they intended me no harm and that because they could tell i was afraid they would be leaving but that they would return.    

for twenty years after that night i had no further memories of their returning. i did though have many days when i would awake in the mornings and feel tired. i had a strange feeling that i had not slept much that night and that something had happened, i felt somehow violated but could not put my finger on why. as strange as it sounds i could not even force myself to dwell on the feelings. i could only recall things like trying to scream but nothing would come out, wanting to run but being paralyzed. i could not recall why i wanted to scream or run.
number two: (1992) i was about 30 years old
by this time i had come to realize that i was being visited by something at times but could recall very little about the visits. that all changed one night after a visit in a hotel in bandung, indonesia. i became aware one night that i was on a vessel of some kind, being escorted down a hall way by two beings that i was familiar with. i could tell by the curvature of the hall that the vessel was round. there was a door every so often on my right side but they were closed. if they had been open they would have been exterior doors. 
i finally got to a point to where there was a door on the left, it was open. across from that door was another exterior door. sitting next to the exterior door was a slightly chunky brunette woman who was without clothes. i tried to ask her to help me but as usual nothing would come out. she gave me a look that showed she also wanted help but could offer none.  
i was escorted through the door on the left, into an examination room. in that room there was an examination table perpendicular to the door with two beings standing with their backs to us. they were standing at the foot end of the table. across from them, on the other side of the table, facing them was a tall being. i knew him to be the one in charge. on the same side of the table as the tall one but with her back to me was another being who i knew to be female and i was very familiar with her. i got on the table.
the tall male then communicated by saying hello and telling me to not worry that i had nothing to fear. he then went on to say ���you remember cela, she has be there every time we have visited you���. at that time a few things happened all at once. she turned around. one of the two beings now on my right at the foot of the table said ���she is there every time because having someone familiar there makes them easier to control���. she stepped towards me saying ���tonight we are going to do sex things, you like that.��� i then reached up with my left hand and grabbed her around her skinny neck. i squeezed as tight and as hard as i could, i had her good, she was in trouble.
then simultaneously the tall one asked ���how has this happened, i thought we had control of him���. the two others responded ���i don���t know, we did have control of him; we thought we had control of him���. then for some reason my hand just opened up and released her. the tall one then grabbed her to keep her from falling, she was hurt bad. the tall one then said ���return him; return them all���. it turned out there was seven of us.     
the next thing i recall was standing behind some bushes as one of us was returned to their place. i do not remember how they were returned but i do remember my own returning.
i was staying in a building separate from the main hotel. at the front door of my building was small entrance way. to the left was stairs heading up to my level. to the right was a karaoke bar. the two beings escorting me stepped through the entrance way as a lady who worked at the karaoke bar stepped into the entrance way. she just kind of went blank and stood there. as i stepped on to the stairs heading up to the level of my room she kind of like unfroze and looked at me. it was obvious that she was confused. i think to her i had just appeared there. i kept walking up the stairs, she stood there confused.
my two escorts and i made our way to my room. the next thing i knew i woke up in my bed with a great since of accomplishment! i could remember most of what happened the night before. i felt like ���wow i got her���!
after that night i had years where i felt they were no longer visiting me. then i became aware that i was wrong. they were still coming but they had a new trick.
it became clear over the next several years that they were still visiting me but now they caused me to interlock my fingers, try as i might i could not pull my hands apart.
number three: (2009) i was about 48
the last memory i have of them coming to visit was four or five years ago now. on this occasion i found myself outside my parent���s house in alabama with several beings around me. their craft was sitting next to the woods; i was sitting on the tailgate of my truck, with my fingers interlocked. my dog was there and unfazed by the beings. i was told that they would no longer be visiting me and they were there to remove something that allowed them to find me. i was told they were giving me some kind of information and was told that when the time came i would know how to use this information. i have no memory of what this information was.      
that is my story.
i would like help in remembering more, but i don���t know how to go about finding that help.
i am not looking for any help with paying for any help i could get in retrieving memories. i just want to be pointed in the direction to find that help.
content.summary: Abductions

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking one of my dogs-this would have been around the 10:30pm range,saturday evening..We live within a residential area that has man made lakes..As we were coming off the walkway behind one of the lakes, a super bright and large light,falling from the sky caught my attention. i saw it through the pine tree's of some homes across the street.It appeared to have come from behind the lower cloud cover,in the far sw and then disappear back into it.I would describe it as a falling effect. if it was a meteor? it was super bright and fairly large from my distance of sight. i watched the area for a few seconds more to see if anything else appeared in the area-and it didn't.
content.summary: Super white falling light

content.detailedDescription: i consider this event to be rare with u.F.O. sightings. i also think it is the real deal! i drove into my parking lot around 10 p.M.On the date specified in eureka, ca where i was living at the time. i was in my car and shut off the engine and lights and heard a helicopter hovering in the distance. i looked up over my apt.(duplex) and saw what appeared to be a black helicopter hovering in the background about 200 feet above the ground with one pilot inside because the cockpit light was on. it hovered for only a few minutes as if it was looking around and then flew off. the night was very dark and there was no moonlight. a minute or two later i was getting ready to leave my car thinking it was only a police copter checking the area and all of a sudden there appeared what seemed to me like another helicopter only about 50 feet over the apt. interior lights came on and i could see what appeared to be a round dome like what you would see on the under side of a blimp, but it was larger than anything i have ever seen on a blimp even at close range. the windows were fairly large and opaque colored, sort of with a translucsent sheen. inside i saw this figure standing that looked like a large human. it had very broad shoulders, big arms and what appeared to be a fairly large head. i couldn't make out any other features because of the opaque windows with a metal-like sheen. the being appeared to move (walk) around the cockpit almost robotic-like adjusting different controls which i could not see. the craft hovered silently over the apt. with no movement, no outside lights and absolutely no noise as i discovered when i opened my side window. it didn't move, however there was no wind blowing either. i felt very apprehensive and decided not to get out. i sure had never seen a blimp like this, however i could not see the shape or size of the craft because there was very little light in the parking lot and no moonlight and the craft itself had no exterior lights. the being inside did not appear to be hostile, just curious.  i thought for a minute and decided to communicate with it by flashing my car headlights on and off in a random manner, something that i remembered from the movie,"close encounters of a third kind". as i did so, its outside lights came on and flashed back at me in the same pattern and sequence that i was using. the lights were white and very bright curving and encomposing the bottom front of the craft just below what appeared to be a curving disk.  we did this for a few minutes and remembered that i smiled a little. i shut my lights off and it did so almost immediately after. a few seconds later it shut off its interior lights and everything was pitch black again. i could hear no sound what so ever if the craft flew away or just disappeared. also, there were no other people around as witnesses because most of the people are asleep there at that time as attested to by the fact that no other house or apt. lights were on then. i still think about the incident to this day and often wonder if it was all just a joke and it was really just a black blimp of some kind. however, i know that i sure didn't sleep well that night! in the past there have been several sightings around the eureka area only of strange objects hovering or landing from various people in the area including yurok and hupa native americans. i don't know if these people are even around there anymore.
content.summary: In paking space at my duplex, observed what appeared to be a colorless helicopter hovering. helicopter flew away and this object appeared about 50 feet over my apt. while hovering silent and motionless saw a being behind opaque square windows in a dome.

content.detailedDescription: First off i'd like to say i've seen few objects never to be identified and this thing was the most amazing beautiful thing i've ever seen in my life. was shaped like a golden red bell even had the knocker looking thing just like a bell does . but it was a solid object  no moving parts. no motor no sounds.Im guessing it's size to be bigger than at least 3 airplanes . also in my pictures i noticed a cloud that seemed to appear and then disappear at which at the time i took photos i was more drawn to the golden red bell. i was on a public bus and everyone on bus rather they want to admit it they all saw the same thing. i've spent every day since then looking for others with pictures or just the story. i've heard it was said on radio the bell shaped object was going down the road this is a hour after i saw it. also the  golden bell does not look like a golden bell at all as i saw in my pics and the one other i found about this object.  i'd like to thank the little boy who spoke up saying daddy what's that in the sky. if not for there conversation i'd not seen it for myself. if i could go back i'd got off that bus and seen just how it ended it's beautiful show.
content.summary: Was most amazing thing i've ever seen

content.detailedDescription: First off i'd like to say i've seen few objects never to be identified and this thing was the most amazing beautiful thing i've ever seen in my life. was shaped like a golden red bell even had the knocker looking thing just like a bell does . but it was a solid object  no moving parts. no motor no sounds.Im guessing it's size to be bigger than at least 3 airplanes . also in my pictures i noticed a cloud that seemed to appear and then disappear at which at the time i took photos i was more drawn to the golden red bell. i was on a public bus and everyone on bus rather they want to admit it they all saw the same thing. i've spent every day since then looking for others with pictures or just the story. i've heard it was said on radio the bell shaped object was going down the road this is a hour after i saw it. also the  golden bell does not look like a golden bell at all as i saw in my pics and the one other i found about this object.  i'd like to thank the little boy who spoke up saying daddy what's that in the sky. if not for there conversation i'd not seen it for myself. if i could go back i'd got off that bus and seen just how it ended it's beautiful show.
content.summary: Was most amazing thing i've ever seen

content.detailedDescription: At the time of sighting we where at the look out at whiskey town lake taking photos. the object was not visible to the human eye. it was later in photos we discovered object. photos where taken from a iphone 5 and from galaxy 4 camera phones.
content.summary: Ufo at whiskey town lake, ca

content.detailedDescription: At 12:20 am may 4,2014, i was laying in bed watching tv. the curtains to my bedroom were slightly parted when  out of the corner of my right eye i noticed a bright orange object which looked like it may have been the new  moon, however, the object was descending with a tail and looked like a fire off to the west. i dismissed for about a minute, looked back and watched. it had not moved, but still looked like a fire in the sky. it hovered for a minute or two, when i noticed a glowing white orb directly above it in a completely straight line with the fireball.  the fireball, with a tail now, sank out of view into the horizon. orb immediately disappeared upwards. this occurred for about 20 minutes. as i am disabled, i could not get to camera fast enough. this is similar to a sighting my late husband and i had on dunlapsville rd. while returning from and elks meeting. joe shields was the investigator. my elderly cat was laying on my arm, too, and would not let me move. my reaction, believe it or not, was that this is becoming commonplace around here, but having science degrees, it does beg the question as to what these things are.
content.summary: Descending orange flame, then ascending from flame, a white glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: During one evening in the fall of 1971, myself and the neighboring community in a busy residential avenue with nearby small local shops, witnessed the descent of a glowing object descending very fast in the sky from the southeast of our location. the obvious looking saucer shaped object hovered directly over two buildings across the street from where i stood with others,  and we could clearly see it was a round, saucer shaped, white glowing surface, with multi-colored lights appearing to rotate in sequence in one direction. initially we were unable to see underneath, but the craft began to turn at a different angle to disclose its underbelly and then we could see the smaller shaped disc attached (as part of the same craft), also with multi-colored lights also rotating in sequence in the opposite direction. the object slowly began to ascend and then took off in a blink of an eye and was "gone" heading in approximately the same direction it descended. no noise whatsoever. not a sound. the entire surrounding community of eyewitnesses fell silent after it's departure. a metro bus approaching stopped right in the middle of the intersection when the craft was in view. it was an amazing sight.
content.summary: White glowing saucer shape with two levels of lights. larger disc rotating in one direction and second smaller disc in opposite.

content.detailedDescription: 8:35 pm az time, was outside with my coworker looking at the stars. i thought i saw a cloud moving but as my eye focused on it i noticed it was shaped like a boomerang, traveling kind of fast, & it seemed as though it was invisible. i know if its invisible i shouldn't see it but that's how my brain comprehended it. my coworker then said wow that's a space ship or something i then saw it ripple....No sounds, no lights. maybe it's a spy plane but az it flew over it turned slightly & i no longer could see it. it never moved up or down it just moved; it scared me. i had an overwhelming feeling that i shouldn't have seen it.
content.summary: It was getting dark. i looked at the stars. thought i saw a cloud moving. it came into view & it appeared to be invisible or something like we were not supposed to see it but did. it scared me because it rippled

content.detailedDescription: I reported this months ago , a field investigator contacted me a gave statement . he said this spring he would get back in contact. well he lied tomorrow is may 4th and i wanted to be out there with all kinds of equiptment just in case it comes back . and to investigate the sight but i cant get no help. i'm gonna have to do this myself .Wish me luck and get investigators that are willing to go that extra mile to prove these are real and here . because just asking questions isn't getting us anywhere.I want a higher up's person to contact me . i will take the job of a real in the field trying to get the ultimate proof and not fail to respond to those who are needing this stuff solved.
content.summary: Help

content.detailedDescription: We were out walking the dogs. i saw a dense group of what i thought were stars until i realized how many there were clustered together and how quickly they were moving. they were pulsating a little and moving in some sort of formation (like a worm) across the sky. eventually they moved so far east i couldn't see them.
content.summary: A group of orbs moving across the sky in apparent formation

content.detailedDescription:
In approximately late july 2013, my son and i were out in our back yard during the midday. we heard a loud, low humming/whirring sound as if a very fast jet were passing overhead. since we regularly see jets from our yard, we knew instantly that this was not only a different craft, but a much faster craft not trying to land or takeoff from the albuquerque sunport.
we couldn't see anything, nor could we sense anything other than through our sense of hearing.
tonight, may 3, 2014, about 22:15, the same sound occurred again. this time however, my son witnessed a star-like shape in the sky due west of our home moving very quickly to the north. he rushed inside to tell me that the sound was the same as we had heard together in the previous summer. this time he saw a light which was certainly associated with the sound, if not the source.
together we scanned the skies within seconds of this sighting and there were no civilian or military aircraft in the sky to our knowledge.
content.summary: Second witnessed event of very fast moving ufo at same place in 9 months

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dog at about 10:30 pm. i observed our local object emitting a beam of light from nw to se in s direction of an unknown, unlit object direction in se sky. between the local object and the unknown object was a array of local small colored lights arranged in a diamond shaped array. i went inside for a half hour and when  i went out and looked skyward they had stopped firing at the object in the se sky. according to the local news tonight a large unknown object had exploded overhead in springfield mo area loud enough to be heard in the entire area in and around this area. they broadcast that it was a meteor that had been distroyed in the atmosphere. this the us governments stand on what happened. i missed the loud sound because my husband is profoundly deaf and had the tv turned up really loud. the local objects where in the same area of the sky tonight they were not emitting light beams tonight. no sounds toninght that i have heard. this confirmed what i saw last night and tonight.
content.summary: I saw local ufo object in battle with an unknown object not seen

content.detailedDescription:
Outside of our home i saw what looked like 30-40 stars flying from west to east in what looked like a fleet. i called my family outside to witness what i was seeing. all 4 of us saw these unknown orbs flying rapidly east across the sky. my wife counted 40 something lights. we have randomly seen these orbs before in nm and az. we were always told " oh they are just satellites. well, unless satellites are now in fleets of 40, then these are no satellites!
craziest thing we've ever since the phx lights.
content.summary: My family witnessed what looked like a fleet of over 35 orbs or what looked like stars rapidly heading west to east.

content.detailedDescription: Moving fast from south to north in the western sky at around 10:00. there were apx thirty object that i observed by eye and also with a 10x50 nikon binoculars. event lasted apx 10-12 +/-. some one else had to have seen this event as it way very prominent in the sky. i was observing jupiter with bionoculars when event took place.
content.summary: Observed several flashing white lights in a cluster west of my location at about 45 degrees. they were moving fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was out and doing some of things for my job and exited out of one of the buildings i work at. then looked up about 45 degrees and saw just under the few clouds out in the sky, a orange-red circular like object traveling east to west, which i also found strange because a airplane that was in the same area above it. it was traveling from south-east, to north-west with the regular lights on.

the object was traveling across the sky at a decent speed, but staying the orange-red color all the time. it was bright, then as it got a bit further it dimmed and then seemed to disappear.

i did take one photo that i could catch with my cellphone camera, but it didn't turn out very good, if someone could crop it and get closer or something as such that would be good.
content.summary: Orange red ufo going across sky

content.detailedDescription: A redish-orange orb witnessed that night.  (and many other nights).  all were filmed and documented on paper by myself.  (i've recieved much critisism from family members on this issue.  that does not deter me though.
content.summary: This is just an initial report that i'm making on one of several.  this is the only report i'll make in this form.  i'll wait for further contact from your "people" to disclose more.

content.detailedDescription:
Four of us were standing outside of a restaurant talking in ohio, at bennett corners (at the intersection of strongsville and brunswick cities), approximately 11:00 on 5-02-2014.  one of us looked up and said "look", and we observed a plane with blinking red lights flying at a normal high altitude, followed at a distance by at first six round orange balls with red outlines.  these were spaced apart, and were following at approximately the same speed.  these were joined by 5-6 more at a lower altitude than the others appearing like two rows.  all objects traveled starting sw heading n until they disappeared from visual sight. ironically, all of us had seen one object of similar appearance to these before!  i photographed one of these flying from the s heading n last summer in the same vicinity.

none of us were actually surprised, what was surprising was how many of these there were, and they were following a plane which appeared to be a jet.  two of us tried to photograph and film with cell phones, but the glare from the parking lot lights prevented any usable documentation.  the objects were far away in the distance overhead.
content.summary: 12 round orange objects with red outlines following a jet

content.detailedDescription: First observed what looked to be an odd-colored star to the west, as it was just stationary in the sky, suddenly fell straight down. went inside and when i came back out there were two more yellow-orange glowing lights coming quickly from the north, heading south towards the area the first object had fallen. once they reached that location the second light made an abrupt 90 degree turn and fell towards the ground. before the 3rd object made the same turn towards the ground a fourth object was observed moving much faster, almost as if it were trying to intercept the two. the third object started to descend but it's light went out before dropping below the tree line. all the objects were slightly higher than the rooftops.
content.summary: 4 yellow-orange lights moving from the north to the south, stopped and made abrupt descents towards the ground, one after the other.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside of my home taking pictures of the moon. it was full and it was a cloudy night. 

the object just started showing up as i focused my camera. 

i thought it was odd. one was tiny and white and the other a beautiful green orb. smooth like a balloon. but shiny. 

the huge green orb stayed near the moon. just hung out near the light of the full moon. the white one was a great deal smaller and was closer but looked much higher in the sky.

i have pictures!!! 

i was unnerved but very curious. saw many more strange objects while living in colorado. i will make another report regarding the largest object i ever saw while living out there.

it left! 

i did not send any photos of the solid white object that i also photographed with the green object.
content.summary: Both objects stayed with the moon. until both vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
Walked out of slider doors on to patio from dining room. going to water
plants as the day was hot and dry. just looked up at clear sky and immediately saw a round disk to my left shoulder traveling to the east. it was round and a spoke (omg a ufo) 
moving very fast and was pulsating (spinning around side of object) pinkish lights. i noticed a cloudy like ora around the object, but it was not breaking into clouds as it was a clear evening. it was high in the sky like air plane would fly if in our area. the object simply disappeared from the sky, did not dart out sight.  i ran in the house and told my daughter who was reading in the living room. i said to her, "ok now i'm a believer". i saw what i saw. i am forever changed now. i think i will start taking this a little more seriously from this day forward.
content.summary: Noticed large round disk moving above and past my house rotating type lights

content.detailedDescription:
Before i relate my experience of this past tuesday, april 29 2014, i must tell you my background. i am currently an "airline pilot" with  34 years of flying experience, and over 28 years as an airline pilot flying all types of aircraft under far part 135 and far part 121. i am currently based in fort lauderdale, fl, (kfll) with a major airline flying as a captain on the airbus 319/320/321. i am typed in the b1900, b737, dc9/md80, and a320. i have ailine experience flying all over the world.

this event took place very close to fort lauderdale airport. i have been flying to (kfll) since 1996 and i am very familiar with the area, the airport traffic flow, the airspace restrictions and the final approach sequence for landing including the approx. areas of the final approach fix for the normal landing on runway 10l (left).

suffice to say, i know where airplanes should be and i know where they  should not be if they have no intention of  landing in kfll on runway 10l.
this object i saw was obviously not landing on 10l and should not have been in the final approach corrider. 

i approximate the object/orb/light to have been about 1500-2000 ft. between the final approach fix novae and pionn.These gps fixes are noted on the ils 10l approach plate for kfll.  that would place it approximately 8-10 miles due west of kfll on the 270 deg radial. 

my family and i, along with many thousands of bruce springsteen fans had just begun leaving the completed concert held at the bb&t center on panther parkway, sunrise, fl. as we were coming out the front doors with thousands of fans, i noticed a group of people pointing and staring in the southern sky. i looked up to see what they were watching and saw the following:

a extremely bright, pulsating round white light appeared to be slowly moving north toward the arena. i immediately assumed in was an aircraft on base leg getting ready to make a right turn to land at kfll. the landing light, or what i though was a landing light was extremely bright. thinking back it really was to bright to be an aircraft but i figured it could be.

it started pulsating from bright white to pulsating blue to red to back to blue, etc. it slowed and i thought it had begun a turn to the east to set up for landing but it appeared to stop in mid-air. the bright light then changed to a star pattern like design but the best i can describe it... is apppeared to be like a bright blue asterik just like this *. at least 3, maybe 4 but i believe 3...Crossed lines of bright blue crossed lines....Steady....Not moving...Stationary. 

before the asterik design appeared, i kept trying to dismiss this event as first..  a jet aircraft inbound to kfll from the south. but no noise could be heard and the landing lights were too bright for a jet. then when it appeared to stop in mid-air i figured it to be a helicopter. but still no noise. then when the star-asterik (*) pattern appeared, i assumed maybe it to be a helicopter with advertising on the skids...But no written message or ad appeared, just the bright asterik design.

seconds later the asterik immage disappeared but a small white orb/light stayed. it then made two or three extremely fast, zig-zag flight maneuvers that i have never seen any wordly flying aircraft make. it then suddenly  stopped... and and then shot straight up out of sight and an extreme rate of speed that i can not explain not have i ever seen an aircraft or helicopter do before.

this whole incident only last about 1 minute from the time i saw other people watching something to the time it shot upwards to the stars and disappeared.

i tried to see if the object was still around but the crowd was sort of moving me along as i was in the way of the mass of fans leaving the front doors of the concert. as i walked to my car, tree tops in the parking lot began to obstruct my view and my  family and i had become separated. i made my way back to the car and watched the sky for a few minutes and did not see anything else. my 16 year old son witnessed basically the same phenomina i saw. 

i wish i had thought to film this with my phone but it happened so fast that had i got my phone out of my pocket, waited for it to turn on, frame, focus in dark sky, etc. i am sure i would have missed the event but i feel reluctant now that i did not at least try.

the weather that evening was clear skies. no clouds that i can recall, visibility was good to excellent, temp. in the low 80's. i could not make out any shape of the object. only the bright pulsating light that changed colors and shape as described above.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: View unexplained large pulsating bright light/orb. made several directional changes. pulsated white/blue/red to blue asterik shape, then small dot... then ascended at tremendous unexplained speed out of view.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 2am, i went out to the back yard to let my dog out and as soon as i got outside i saw a vary bright light in the sky. it looked bigger then any other star or planet in the sky that night. at first it did,nt move,then it started to slowly move. i watched as it headed north, then within 2 or 3 seconds it was gone. i never seen anything move that fast in the sky befor. as for how i was feeling about it,, i did,nt fall back to sleep till 5 - 6 am. i know i saw somthing that night, what it was i dont know???
content.summary: It was in the sky,  i saw it,, it was not a plane.  planes do not fly that fast...

content.detailedDescription: I did not see it, i left my camera out for a night time exposure shot and saw it once it was uploaded to my computer.
content.summary: I did not see it i left my camera out for a niht time exposure shot and saw it once it was uploaded to my computer

content.detailedDescription: Just finished playing basketball and walked to the porch of my house when i seen my friends walking down the block we sat there talking when one of my friends look there is a meteor passing by so we looked and saw that is wasn't falling out of the sky but seemed like it was gliding so we took out our phones to take pictures and record when we notice that two more were side by side so then the they past and then we see three more in the sky it seemed a little more like a formation but then one starts headwind in our direction then suddenly does a tight spin then returns to its path with the other two lights a few seconds later a the last one passes by and then you don't see any more about a few minutes go by and a black helicopter is hovering around like it's searching for something and then a jet flys by at a real steady speed
content.summary: 7 orange lights flu by at a not to fast pace one changed direction torwards us the went the oppisite way very fast helicopters appear shortly after and a jet flying very low as if they were looking for something

content.detailedDescription: I took a picture of water pouring into my glass cup, there is a light from the refrigerator, which you can see. but it doesn't explain the characteristics of the lines of light you can see throughout the water. if you look close you can see what looks like a universe, and in which images that look rather odd. as if this picture is of what they would paint on egyptian walls. like i said, this is a picture of me pouring a cup of water with a bright light from a refrigerator. no filter added. picture taken with an i phone 4s
content.summary: Look at this picture of water, i did not expect this result. i have more pictures.

content.detailedDescription: We were on our way home from working night shift, coming down the road to our home there is a hill where we saw something hovering. as we got closer it became much bigger . it was hovering just offside our road extremely low to the ground and when we got up too it our car was almost underneath it. we turnd the car off and jumped out and stood almost directly underneath it just staring up . it was around 5 am, we live in the countryside and there was no noise to be heard at all. pure silence. as we looked at it , it seemed to make a jumbo 747 look like a baby plane in comparison. it was a dark or black triangle and had 3 white rectangular panels of light under it so from where we looked at it , there was one rectangle above and two underneath all horizontal. the light was all evenly bright, no fluttering or movement of it. we stared at it for about 15 minutes looking at eachother like now what. then very suddnely it changed direction and zipped of diagonally to the east and dissappeard within seconds and without a sound. my husband still refuses to think it could be from another planet but he cannot refuse to admit what he saw. however 2 nights prior to this sighting i got up in the middle of the night to get a glass of water. when i went to the kitchen window i saw an object off to the east with colored lights (red, yellow, green) and it was doing manouvers like movine up , down, to the side and stopping each time. i could not see that well so went to get my binoculars. i could see much better but it was at quite a distance. i observed this strange movement until it dissapeard. i feel lucky to have witnessed these events. whether alien or earthly they were a sight to see.
content.summary: Huge, silent triangle with 3 large rectangular light panels on the bottom of it

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: A co-worker was giving me a ride home. above geist i noticed 3 bright lights in a triangle formation in the sky. mind you it is cloudy out...No stars and no moon. so i point it out to my co-work who proceeded to say "what the f... is that?" i say "i don't know but that's not an airplane." as we are slowly driving forward. then we see two more lights side by side following behind. one would speed up then slow down. then another and another light all fly in a speed i don't normally associate with any type of plane. and i know planes my partner is a aircraft mechanic / inspector. anyway my friend turned on to the main road at which time the lights kept coming some would follow the others for a distance then shoot off in another direction. while some would seem disappear in their very spot. he and i were discussing what it could be and all i could keep saying is this isn't right this just isn't right. he's freaked out but we keep driving until we reach a round about at which time we turn north and pull over. we sit there and watch one, two, a pair, one, one, and so on. we sat there for at least 10 minutes. they just kept coming but my friend started stressing and kept saying "i've got to turn around now" and i kept saying just wait a minute but he turned around headed back to round about at which time we could still see some coming as we turned right for about 2 minutes until trees disrupted our view as he was driving. i think i was much more excited than my friend. i think it scared him a lot.  by the way there was other people driving so maybe they saw something too.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Left work coworker was giving me aride when we saw 3 lights in a triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
The 1st night went outside to take the garbage out and saw a pulsing lite in the sky towards the west. got a pair of small binoculars and a smartphone to observe. when magnified you could see distinct white, blue and red lites, sometimes together, sometimes alone. no noise. appeared to be far away. watched for 1/2 hour. rechecked 1/2 hr after that, it was gone.

2nd nite, saw same set of pulsing lites, stationary same location in sky.
eventually faded from site..Going away from us? smaller, dimmer....Gone

3rd. had two friends come and witness the same pulsating lites, same spot in sky to the west. friend brought huge binoculars! and a very good sony digital camera with 24 x 60 zoom. got some nice pix with different color lites together, separate, white orb, fuzzy edges. stayed in same place for an hour. all the while planes and a helicopter passing overhead. an hour later we saw 2 lites to the north, same colors, pulsation hovering etc. appeared at times to have a small white lite (orb?) going back and forth between the two larger lites. a little later a triangular lite with surrounding lites marking it's shape. tilted on an angle. to the left of the two pulsationg lites! watched for at least 1/2 an hour.

we'll report if this occurs a 4th nite in a row.
none of the four of us have any idea what this is. we all agreed none of us have ever seen anything like this.
content.summary: Saw hovering pulsing lites 3 nites in a row with no noise
